## combineRequestSlots() function

Combines two slot maps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function combineRequestSlots(current: RequestSlotMap, incoming: RequestSlotMap): RequestSlotMap;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [RequestSlotMap](./stentor-models.requestslotmap.md) | The current slots |
|  incoming | [RequestSlotMap](./stentor-models.requestslotmap.md) | The new incoming slots |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RequestSlotMap](./stentor-models.requestslotmap.md)

## Remarks

The incoming will only override the current if the value doesn't exist on the current and exists on the incoming. This is helpful for slot filling.

If both are undefined, an empty object is returned.
